summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Judicial Nominating Commission of the City of Dallas will convene on April 30, 2024, at 6:00 PM. This meeting will be held via videoconference and in-person at City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas. The primary purpose is to interview candidates for municipal judge positions.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The main focus of the meeting is the executive session dedicated to interviewing candidates for full-time Municipal Judges, including the Administrative Judge and Associate Judge roles. This session will adhere to Section 551.074 of the Texas Open Meetings Act, allowing for deliberation on the appointment and employment of these judges.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include a closed executive session, which may cover legal advice regarding pending litigation, property negotiations, and the evaluation of public officers or employees. Additionally, there are strict prohibitions against carrying firearms into the meeting venue, as outlined by Texas Penal Code sections.

**Action Items**:  
The Commission will seek to finalize the selection of candidates for the Municipal Judge positions, making decisions on appointments based on the interviews conducted during the meeting. Approval of the selected candidates is anticipated as an outcome of the discussions.
